name: Merge Number Puzzle.
description:
“Merge Number Puzzle” is an amazing puzzle game. Relax and train your brain. You can play this puzzle game anytime and anywhere!

How to play this game?
⁃ Drag the number blocks to move them.
⁃ Merge the same number to create a bigger number.
⁃ NO TIME LIMIT!

Features:
⁃ Easy to play
⁃ Challenging to break your highest score.
⁃ Multiple beautiful themes!
⁃ Multiple materials!
⁃ Useful tools in the game.
⁃ Very Relaxing! No Time Limit!


Have fun! No Time Limit!
